title: Becel Buttercream Frosting Recipe
description: With just four ingredients, this buttercream frosting will turn your everyday desserts into creamy, dreamy creations.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Everyday Cooking Vegan Desserts Becel Buttercream Frosting Be the first to rate & review! 2 Photos With just four ingredients, this buttercream frosting will turn your everyday desserts into creamy, dreamy creations. Submitted by Becel Updated on February 21, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo Prep Time: 15 mins Total Time: 15 mins Servings: 24 Yield: 24 servings Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 24 servings 1 cup Becel® Salted Plant-Based Bricks 4 cups icing sugar ¼ cup 2% milk 2 teaspoons vanilla extract Directions Blend Becel Salted Plant-Based Bricks with icing sugar, milk, and vanilla until blended. Beat on medium-high speed, scraping sides occasionally, until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes. Tips This recipe makes enough frosting to frost 24 cupcakes or 13 x 9 inch (33 x 23 cm) cake. The metric measures for this recipe are as follows: 250 mL Becel Salted Plant-Based Bricks, 1 L icing sugar, 60 mL 2% milk, and 10 mL vanilla extract. name: Becel
instructions: Blend Becel Salted Plant-Based Bricks with icing sugar, milk, and vanilla until blended. Beat on medium-high speed, scraping sides occasionally, until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes.
